name: Apperentice's stone
des: When defeating 1 enemy, the champion owning this Rune will increase physical damage by 5. The effect will be reset after each round.

name: Hunter's Treasure
des: Champion's attacks deal additional damage equal to 2% of the target's missing health.

name: Regeneration Rune
des: When the champion carrying this gem has 10% health left, the champion will recover 5% of its maximum health over 5s.

name: Astral Rune
des: Attacks will have a 20% chance to apply Confused to the target. Confused mark broken by skills will cause the enemy to be confused for 2s.
des2: Confused - Confused targets will reverse and lose ability to cast.

name: Wicked Charm
des: Enemies hit by a champion possessing this gem will burn 20% of the skill's damage for 10s. And take the Curse effect during that time.
des2: Curse - Grievous Wounds reduces the target's healing by 40%.

name: Ancestor's Relic
des: Gain 2 mana for each enemy champion killed on the way.

name: Juxtapose Chipped
des: Within 10 seconds of spawning, when HP drops below 20%. Gems will activate Mirror Image
des2: Mirror Image - Champion splits into 2 entities and cannot be affected while cloned.

name: Guardian Sign
des: While moving on the road, the owning champion will reduce the damage taken by 10%.

name: Lionheart
des: Champions standing around the champion possessing this rune will all gain 15% attack speed. The champion owning this gem also gains 15% attack speed.

name: Joomong's Eyelash
des: All physical attacks cannot be missed.

name: Chain Lightning Rune
des: Owned champion will launch 1 lightning bolt every 5 physical attacks, the lightning will spread to 5 nearby enemies. Lightning will deal 10% AP of the champion. In addition, the lightning will also reduce the enemy's magic resistance by 50%.

name: Megamorph Sphere
des: Owned champions when attacked will gain 1 charge, each charge will increase armor and magic resistance by 2%. The maximum number of charges is 25.

name: Multishot Rune
des: Physical attacks will fire 2 extra rays to attack nearby targets. Extra ray deals 25% of original damage. The secondary ray also applies on-hit effects.

name: Talisman of Demolition
des: Physical attacks ignore 35% of the target's armor.

name: Inquisitor's Command
des: The skill hits the target, will jolt lightning to 2 nearby enemies and deal damage. Each lightning bolt deals 25% AP.

name: Seal of Refraction
des: Owned champion will gain 1 layer of virtual health equal to 10% of maximum health.

name: Icewind Talon
des: Damage skills will create an area of Cold Feet effect for 3 seconds on enemies walking in it.
des2: Cold Feet - Effect reduces movement speed by 30%.

name: Magic Critical Rune
des: The champion that owns this rune will make the skill critical. Critical Chance (CC) and Critical Damage (CD) will be calculated according to %CC and %CD of its owner

name: Mana Restoration Rune
des: Champion possessing runes has a 15% increased chance to block damage from critical hits.

name: Frost Armor Rune
des: Being damaged by physical attacks applies a Frotsbite effect to enemies attacking you.
des2: Frostbite - Hero of this effect will have his attack speed reduced by 20%.
